oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Faith Hope and Charity Society
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Lodges
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Charter of Incorporation for the Faith, Hope and Charity Society of Wilson County.

The Faith Hope and Charity Society of Wilson County was a benevolent organization founded in 1896. Like other benevolent groups, it offered sickness benefits to its members. Hundreds of these groups organized across the state in the years following the Civil War.
